required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on December 16, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, and Placebo-Controlled Phase 3 Clinical Study Patients With Androgenetic Alopecia (AGA)
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, and Placebo-Controlled Phase 3 Clinical Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Finasteride Spray (CU-40102) in Chinese Adult Male Patients With Androgenetic Alopecia (AGA)

brief_summary.textblock: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, and Placebo-Controlled Phase 3 Clinical Study ,the mean change from baseline in vertex target area hair count (TAHC) after treatment for 24 weeks.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Drug:0.25% (2.275mg/mL) Finasteride Spray Placebo for CU-40102 Spray
study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: the change from baseline in target area hair count (TAHC) in the vertex after treatment

intervention.description: topical application, 1~4 sprays each time, once daily
